Hole in One

egg

Ingredients

  • Bread (preferably Dave's Killer White Bread)
  • Eggs
  • Butter or Mayo

Procedure

  1. Spread butter or Mayo on both sides of bread
  2. Use a biscuit cutter or cup to cut out the center of each slice
  3. On medium high heat place a slice of bread in a non-stick pan
  4. crack and egg into the hole in the center
  5. Flip once
  6. Remove to plate when egg reaches desired doneness
  7. Don't forget to toast the hole you cut out, too!
